About Me

Hi! I am Adi. Now, I live in Bandung. I am an Electronics Engineer. I have good experience in design electronics system on microcontroller, espesially based on Arduino. I am not an artis or designer, but occassionally, I like to improve my creativity by playing with Inkscape to design a logo or poster. I found great passion to learn more about Front End Development. I am considered myself as a new developer so be nice with me :D. Let's get connected.
